title: Talking Pen
content:
Sandy receives a birthday gift. It's a new book.

The book comes with a pen. But it's not just any pen. It's a special pen.

When Sandy points the pen at the words in the book, it starts talking!

It's called a talking pen. It reads the book aloud with Sandy. Her mom tells her that this is a new kind of book.

What a great way to read a book!
